original_text: Beerah his son, whom Tiglath-pileser king of Assyria carried away into exile; he was a chief of the Reubenites.
korean_text: 그의 아들은 브에라이니 그는 르우벤 자손의 지도자로서 앗수르 왕 디글랏빌레셀에게 사로잡힌 자라

sentences.original_text: whom Tiglath-pileser king of Assyria carried away into exile;
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르 왕 디글랏빌레셀이 그를 사로잡아 끌고 갔으니,

sentences.original_text: he was a chief of the Reubenites.
